title: The Pinball Arcade Patches v1.24.8 & v1.25.10
description:
REMEMBER, YOU'LL NEED TO PATCH TO V1.24.8 FIRST AND THAN TO V1.25.10

HOW TO PATCH V1.23.7 TO V1.24.8

1. Copy the contents from the folder "v1.23.7 - Original Files" REPLACE FILES into the game folder 
2. Copy "TPA - v1.23.7 to v1.24.8" into the game folder
3. Run as Admin "TPA - v1.23.7 to v1.24.8" and click "YES"
4. Wait for the patcher to finish (it takes several minutes)
5. Copy the contents from the folder "v1.24.8 - Crack" into the game folder

The folder "v1.24.8 - Original Files" is included for patch to v1.25.10

HOW TO PATCH V1.24.8 TO V1.25.10

1. Copy the contents from the folder "v1.24.8 - Original Files" REPLACE FILES into the game folder 
2. Copy "TPA - v1.24.8 to v1.25.10" into the game folder
3. Run as Admin "TPA - v1.24.8 to v1.25.10" and click "YES"
4. Wait for the patcher to finish (it takes several minutes)
5. Copy the contents from the folder "v1.25.10 - Crack" into the game folder
6. Enjoy


I hope you have great times with this amazing game.
